description: To import an RPE file in OPC Router Configuration, select File → Import OPC Router 4 project , navigate to the RPE file, and click Open .
To export an RPE file in OPC Router Configuration, select File → Export OPC Router 4 project , click the ellipsis icon, name the RPE file, and click Save .
NOTE: OPC Router Configuration is used to establish connections between a wide variety of systems, such as PLCs, MQTT, SOAP, REST, databases, printers, and ERP systems.
